text:
Stefan Kendal Gordy (September 3, 1975, Los Angeles, California) is better known for his scene, Redfoo's art is DJ, rapper and the son of an American singer, the founder of Monotow Records, Berry Gordy. In 2006, he created the band LMFAO with its worldwide success in 2011 with the album Sorry Party Rocking before they were removed in 2012. In 2016, he released his album Party Rock Maison.
Acknowledgments.
The first artist to reach 1 million like on YouTube with Videoclip Party Rock Anthem on November 15, 2011 (under the pseudonym LMFAO.)
